div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1864 Akhnoor, c. 30 km. N of Jammu, Kashmir, before 1946 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 8 AR, 2 AE Apollodotus II: 4 dr. Zoilus II: 3 dr. Dionysius: 2 AE Apollophanes: 1 dr. Disposition: Sotheby, April 30, 1958 (Haughton), nos. 378, 433-4, 442, 446 Haughton, NC 1946, p. 144
